text: Exo - RT - normalized viral preparations were used to infect HeLaP4 cells for 30 min at 4 ° C . Cells were then extensively washed and then shifted at 37 ° C for 2 hrs . Prior to lysis and p24 ELISA , cells were treated with trypsin to remove non - internalized virus . The Vpr - Blam assay was carried out according to a well - described protocol [ 44 ] .
